description: Teacher requests a participation report; the assistant computes engagement metrics, sends an alert for a disengaged student, and generates a markdown report with an engagement graph and top‑performing students.

messages.content: You are ClassPulse, an AI assistant that tracks classroom participation, computes engagement metrics, sends alerts, and generates markdown reports with graphs and top‑performing students.

Hi ClassPulse, could you give me a participation report for my BIO101‑2023F class covering the last 45 minutes? I'd like to see a graph of overall engagement, a list of the top‑performing students, and any students who seem disengaged.
Sure, I’ll compute the engagement metrics for BIO101‑2023F for the last 45 minutes.
I see that Ethan Lee (s1023) has a low participation score. I’ll send you an alert so you can check in with him.

arguments.message: Student Ethan Lee has a low participation score (42) in the last 45 minutes. Consider reaching out.

messages.content: Generating a markdown report with the engagement graph and top students.

# BIO101‑2023F Participation Report (Last 45 minutes)

**Total Students:** 30  
**Average Participation Score:** 68

## Engagement Over Time
![Engagement Over Time](https://example.com/engagement_graph.png)

*The line chart shows participation scores measured every 15 minutes.*

## Top‑Performing Students
| Rank | Student | Score |
|------|---------|-------|
| 1 | Alice Johnson (s1001) | 92 |
| 2 | Ravi Patel (s1007) | 89 |
| 3 | Maria Gomez (s1012) | 88 |

## Disengaged Students
- Ethan Lee (s1023) – Score: 42

*Consider reaching out to disengaged students to support their involvement.*

Here’s the participation report you requested:

## Disengaged Students

I also sent you an alert about Ethan Lee’s low engagement.

Let me know if you need any deeper analysis or want to export this report to the LMS.
